role_description: Worked on the software engineer of the company's website, built new features, and improved the user experience.
Implemented a new design system for the website, improved the performance, and optimized the codebase.
Communicated with the designer to implement new designs and features, and worked with the Technical Consultant to integrate new APIs.
Join meetings with the team to discuss new features, improvements, and bugs, and worked with the QA team to fix bugs and improve the quality of the website.
Worked on the frontend of the company's website, built new features, and improved the user experience.
Implemented a new design system for the website, improved the performance, and optimized the codebase.
Communicated with the designer to implement new designs and features, and worked with the Technical Consultant to integrate new APIs.
Join meetings with the team to discuss new features, improvements, and bugs, and worked with the QA team to fix bugs and improve the quality of the website.
Worked on a dashboard application based on a SaaS product that helps Slack communities without leaving slack.
Worked on creating sitemaps for the product, auth and password recovery feature, and frontend UI improvements.
Implemented security measures of LogRocket and introduced events module feature for hosting community events.
Started my career as an intern, worked on the frontend and backend of the company's website and internal tools.
Join the team to build a new product, a web-based application for managing and tracking employee performance.
Improve my skills in JavaScript, Reactjs, ExpressJS, SQL, and other technologies, and learn about the software development process.
